page.title: 01THE POSTHOUSE HOTEL (1)
page.content: ON WEDNESDAY 12.6.85. WE WENT TO THE POSTHOUSE HOTEL TO INTERVIEW THE MANAGER{MR.STAFFORD.}IN REPLY TO OUR QUESTIONS HE SAID:1)THE COST OF A SINGLE ROOM IS Â£43 FOR ONE NIGHT WITHOUT MEALS;2)THERE ARE 7 VIP ROOMS AND 4 SUITES AT Â£150 A NIGHT WITHOUT MEALS. 3)20% OF THE PEOPLE WHO GO TO THE HOTEL ARE FOREIGNERS;4)ALL OF THE ROOMS HAVE A TELEVISION,'PHONE AND A MINIATURE FRIDGE WITH DRINKS, FRESH MILK & FRUIT JUICES;5)THE RESTAURANT IS OPEN ALL DAY,SELLING MEALS FOR UP TO Â£13.50. PER PERSON,INCLUDING WINE.CHEAPER MEALS OF BURGER & CHIPS ARE AVAILABLE FOR 95p.FOR THOSE WHO PREFER IT; 6)THERE IS A SWIMMING POOL, SAUNA, GYMNASIUM AND BAR;7)YOU CAN SEE THE LAKE,DUG IN 1975 FOR BUILDING THE A45 BY PASS FROM THE ROOMS OF THE HOTEL.
